attributes.action: UK Parliament to consider a vote on whether to accept the EU referendum result.
attributes.background:
Petition for the sovereign UK Parliament to consider a vote on whether to accept the 23rd June 2016 EU referendum result.

The Leave campaign 'pledges' are already unraveling. David Lammy MP has suggested that parliament should consider rejecting the advisory, non binding referendum.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
